welcome.title: Welcome to FineWallet!
welcome.next_steps: In the next steps you will personalize the app to your liking.
welcome.data_1: All of your data is saved

currency.title: Choose your home currency
currency.text: The home currency is the standard currency you use. When travelling to another currency region, you can change the input currency respectively. Every transaction will then be exchanged to your home currency automatically.
currency.warning: Warning: You cannot change your home currency later on!

dark_mode.title: Enable Dark Mode
dark_mode.text: You may enable dark mode if it is more relaxing for your eyes.

finish.title: You have successfully set up your FineWallet profile!
finish.text: Good luck and have fun saving your money!

overview_page.last_week_load_error: Could not load last weeks transactions!

history_page.share_text: TX SHARE is not available right now.

add_page.title: Add {}
add_page.amount_equals_zero: The specified amount has to be greater than Zero.
add_page.amount_smaller_zero: The specified amount can only be positive!
add_page.recurrence_null: Please specify which recurrence type you want to use!
add_page.recurrence_no_end: Please choose an end date for the recurrence!
add_page.date_null: Please choose a date for your transaction!
add_page.not_a_number: Your specified amount is not a number!
add_page.not_home_currency: You are currently not using your home currency!
add_page.label: Label

settings_page.title: Settings
settings_page.snack_at_home: You are now using your home currency as your input currency.
settings_page.snack_traveling: You are now using {} as your input currency. Every transaction will be converted to your home currency.
